email_or_phone_not_exist: This email or phone number does not exist. If you are not yet registered, click on 'New Account'
account_exists_different_method: There is another account that exists with this email address, but was created via a different method, either Apple or Google
please_enter_a_valid_phone_number: Please enter a valid phone number!
please_enter_the_code: Please enter the code received by SMS at the phone number
cant_find_the_message: If you can't find the message, make sure to check your phone.
incorrect_code: Incorrect code, please verify the code
first_name_for_drivers: Your first name will be for your drivers, your last name is only for your invoices.
by_continuing_i_accept: By continuing I accept the terms of use of Taxi Coq and acknowledge having read its privacy policy.
accept_terms: Please accept our terms of use
enter_full_name: Please enter your first and last name!
terms_and_privacy: By continuing I accept the terms of use of Taxi Coq and acknowledge having read its privacy policy.
enter_valid_phone_number: Please enter a valid phone number!
customize_your_journey: Customize your journey from A to B and beyond with our user-friendly app. Choose your main destination effortlessly, and if your route involves detours, easily add intermediate stops along the way. With us, planning your trip is in your hands, ensuring a bespoke taxi booking experience, without complications.
ready_to_go: Ready to Go? Wait for Your Taxi in Complete Peace
after_booking: After booking your taxi, let us take over. Track your driver's approach in real time on our integrated map, receive real-time notifications, and be alerted as soon as your taxi approaches. No more unnecessary stress. Our system guarantees a hassle-free wait, allowing you to focus on what's important.
taxi_arrived: Your Taxi Has Arrived, Ready to Embark
moment_you_have_been_waiting_for: The moment you have been waiting for is finally here: your taxi is at your doorstep. Quickly identify your driver with the clear details displayed in the app, and get ready to embark on a most pleasant journey.
